text: Gevelsberg is a town in the district of Ennepe-Ruhr Rural District the state of North Rhine-Westphalia. ==Geography== Schwelm is in the southeast of the Ruhr Area of Germany. ==Bürgermeister/Mayor== * 1886 – 1911 : Fritz Knippschild * 1911 – 1919 : Walter Leinberger * 1919 – 1929 : Hermann Müller * 1930 – 1933 : Konrad Rappold * 1933 : Heinrich Hanholz * 1933 – 1945 : Günter Albitz * 1945 : Hermann Hußmann * 1945 – 1961 : Gustav Trost * 1961 – 1991 : Helmut vom Schemm * 1991 – 2004 : Klaus Solmecke * since 2004: Claus Jacobi ==References== ==Other websites== * www.gevelsberg.de Category:Towns in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Ennepe-Ruhr-Kreis
title: Gevelsberg
